beer.beer_description:
Be wary this season. There’s no telling what the night breeze might bring in through the window.

If misfortune has you in its sights, you might be receiving a surprise visit from a rather grim, dark figure that you’ll find paws deep into your booze cellar.

This dandy gourmand is looking to gulp down only all of the most sour, tart, refreshing of your stocked brews, planning to turn himself into a real grouchy behemoth.

You spent the whole day getting cut and bruised through brambles to gather up a nice basket of fresh blackberries? Consider them gone also.

Next time drink your Berliner Weisses fresh, and maybe you won’t attract bad company such as the Sourpuss.

items.badge_description: Happy Halloween! We hope you enjoy some of your spookiest brews on this haunted evening.
It takes the perfect amount light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 190 check-ins with a photo.
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 115 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 24!

The classic Berliner Weisse is crisp, cloudy, and sour. Once the most popular beer style in Berlin, it's gained notoriety and popularity around the globe making us all proud to be Berliners. That's 10 different beers with the style of Berliner Weisse. Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.badge_description: Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 330 different Sour Beers.  Try 5 more for Level 67!

items.checkin_comment: Hell no ... I do like blackberry, but not like this. Wierd smell, milky blueberry tatse, wierd aftertaste

items.checkin_comment: Pale ruby with a lasting head. Nose is sour berries. Taste is refreshing blackberry yogurt, a bit fruity, nice carb but it goes flat fast

items.checkin_comment: No pucker? Should be more sour, still the blackberry is a new thing.

beer.beer_description:
Be wary this season. There’s no telling what the night breeze might bring in through the window.

If misfortune has you in its sights, you might be receiving a surprise visit from a rather grim, dark figure that you’ll find paws deep into your booze cellar.

This dandy gourmand is looking to gulp down only all of the most sour, tart, refreshing of your stocked brews, planning to turn himself into a real grouchy behemoth.

You spent the whole day getting cut and bruised through brambles to gather up a nice basket of fresh blackberries? Consider them gone also.

Next time drink your Berliner Weisses fresh, and maybe you won’t attract bad company such as the Sourpuss.

items.badge_description: Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 70 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 15!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 55 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 12!

items.checkin_comment: Subtle red fruit/berry juice, sourdough, moderate lacto. A bit thin, but a pretty nice overall.

items.badge_description: The classic Berliner Weisse is crisp, cloudy, and sour. Once the most popular beer style in Berlin, it's gained notoriety and popularity around the globe making us all proud to be Berliners. That's 45 different beers with the style of Berliner Weisse. Try 5 more for Level 10!

items.checkin_comment: A decent sour. Nothing spectacular, but just enough to hit the right note
